item.title: Lee Ann add a quote by Cassandra Clare
Lee Ann add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I am a badass, and I recognize that you, too, are a badass." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Lee Ann add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "There is no pretending," Jace said with absolute clarity. "I love you, and I will love you until I die, and if there is life after that, I'll love you then." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Lee Ann add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "If you were half as funny as you think you are, you'd be twice as funny as you are now." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Lee Ann add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Is this the part where you start tearing off strips of your shirt to bind my wounds?" "If you wanted me to rip my clothes off, you should have just asked." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Lee Ann add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Jesus!" Luke exclaimed. "Actually, it's just me," said Simon. "Although I've been told the resemblance is startling." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Lee Ann add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "Declarations of love amuse me. Especially when unrequited." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Lee Ann add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I am a man" he told her, "and men do not consume pink beverages. Get thee gone woman, and bring me something brown." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Lee Ann add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
Lee Ann add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description: "I'd found heaven and grabbed it as tightly as I could, but it was unraveling, an insubstantial thread sliding between my fingers, too fine to hold." -- Maggie Stiefvater
